Hourglass Cosmetics Equilibrium™ Restoring Essence

Brand: Hourglass

Category: Serums & Essences

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER/AQUA, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ALTEROMONAS FERMENT EXTRACT, CALCIUM GLUCONATE, CALCIUM PCA, CAPRYLOYL GLYCINE, CITRIC ACID, ECTOIN, GLUCONOLACTONE, GLYCERIN, HYDROXYECTOIN, LECITHIN, PHOSPHATIDYL-GLYCEROL, SODIUM CITRATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, XANTHAN GUM, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM BENZOATE.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
